title: As a user I want to be able to see Spring Training Stats on a player's profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club 
AND Spring Training is an option in the "Regular Season" dropdown.
custom_steps:
WHEN viewing the stats tab of the player profile
AND Selecting Spring Training
custom_expected:
THEN any of the player's stats earned during Spring Trainings will be displayed.

Wireframe: 
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=stats

title: As a user I want the MN Contract Years and Service Years values on the player's profile to be the sum of the years displayed in the MN Contract/Service Years widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to a players profile
custom_expected:
THEN The MN Contract Years value on the player's profile is set to the sum total of the years marked with a checkmark for MN Contract Year in the MN Contract/Service Years widget.
AND The MN Service Years value on the player's profile is set to the sum total of the years marked with a checkmark for MN Service Year displayed in the MN Contract/Service Years widget.

title: As a BOC user, I would like to upload the initial pool amounts for International Signing Bonuses
custom_preconds:
Given user is logged in as BOC
AND has the following permission: *EBIS-INTL-SIGNING-BONUS-EDITORS*
custom_steps: WHEN the Import button is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN a popup modal that has a year value (format will match the intl signing bonus period -> 2018-2019) will be displayed
AND the current period will be the first value
AND it should go out 10 years
AND It should default to the current period always.
AND The spreadsheet used in the import should match the attached spreadsheet
AND Show a warning upon clicking import saying that any original pool amounts will be replaced with values from the spreadsheet
AND Upon import, we will remove original pool amounts for the given year and replace them with values from the spreadsheet.

-Do not remove any non-original pool amount values if they have been entered
-Do not remove any individual intl bonuses if they have been entered

title: As a user I want re-signing a player with a lapsed CSP or CEP clause to re-activate their CSP or CEP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
AND a player has a CSP or CEP with a "Lapsed" status due to 2 years having passed since they were last active with MLB
custom_steps: WHEN the CSP or CEP needs is moved back to the appropriate "Current" status.
custom_expected:
THEN the player will have a "Current" status. 
(Either Current, Current - Living Allowance Only or Current - Tuition Allowance Only, based on the money left for the CSP/CEP).

title: As a BOC user I want access to a template for creating new Club logos for EBIS
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
AND the Affiliate Profile widget is open
AND the text "Please use the provided template for proper sizing and spacing." is added to the end of the "Note" text beneath the logo block.
AND a link "Download template" with the download icon is added
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking the download link or icon
custom_expected:
THEN the attached template will be downloaded

**Wireframes:**
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=create_new_club

title: As a BOC user I want to import initial pools for R4 Signing Bonuses
custom_preconds:
Given user is logged in as BOC
AND has the following permission: EBIS-INTL-SIGNING-BONUS-EDITORS


Same workflow as Intl Signing Bonus Utility. 

Wireframe: https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=import_pool_amounts
Intl Story: https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163036354
custom_steps: WHEN the Import button is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN a popup modal that has a year value (format will match the intl signing bonus period -> 2018-2019) will be displayed
AND the current period will be the first value
AND it should go out 10 years
AND It should default to the current period always.
AND The spreadsheet used in the import should match the attached spreadsheet
AND Show a warning upon clicking import saying that any original pool amounts will be replaced with values from the spreadsheet
AND Upon import, we will remove original pool amounts for the given year and replace them with values from the spreadsheet.

-Do not remove any non-original pool amount values if they have been entered
-Do not remove any individual intl bonuses if they have been entered

title: As a BO team member, I would like the Crystal Report changes for MNC esign printing changes to be tested by the devs
custom_steps: Some changes were made to the MNC to all for esign capability. The next step is for the dev to test the changes and make sure that everything works. Attached is the email string outlining changes (with screenshots).  Below is the outlined steps in the email Testing Steps:- DEV team can connect to the one we made MNCPG1_TEST and see if they can answer the prompt values dynamically to generate a report via REST              - We only redid the 1st page as we had to get rid of all the subreport links to quickly test              - There is ‰ÛÏdouble‰Û￾ entry as we moved the RSD to the universe/IDT for it to work quickly (image below as well), so hopefully through the REST Call it doesn‰Ûªt have the issue we are in answering via opendoc prompt; if so we just have to see where else to put it- If it works, then having it generate the PDF via REST should be enough as PDFs can be esigned‰Û_

title: As a Club User, I want to Print Another Org's Tender Sheet from the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club
AND After the Tender Date has passed for a given year
AND a Club Users sees a Print button on *ALL* Org's Central Tender Utilities
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the Print Button
custom_expected:
THEN the Tender Listing report for the chosen Org will be printed
BUT The Print button will not appear prior to the Tender Date for the chosen year
AND Prior to the Tender Date, Club Users will only see a Print button for their Org

https://jira.boc.mlb.com:8443/browse/EBISII-14056

title: As a user I want to receive a notification when a Payment is due if not marked paid
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps:
WHEN a payment on an Outright Trade or Waiver Claim Assignment is due 
BUT has not yet been marked paid
custom_expected:
THEN generate Notification #11 for Club and BOC MJ Transaction Admins. E
AND A notification should only be generated for an outstanding payment one time.

Clipboard:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/MJA+Notifications

title: As a user I want to receive a notification 5 days prior to a Player to be Named Later transaction being due if not yet completed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/club
AND a Player to Be Named Later is due five days from the current date on an Outright Trade or Waiver Claim Assignment
BUT has not yet been marked paid or approved
custom_expected:
THEN generate Notification #10 for Club and BOC MJ Transaction Admins. 
AND A notification should only be generated for an outstanding PTBNL one time.


Clipboard:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/MJA+Notifications

title: As a Club User I want to create a new blank Drug Test Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN as is logged in as a Club

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Create New" on the Club's Drug Test Request widget
custom_expected:
THEN a new blank Drug Test Request form per the provided wireframe. 
AND  Initially, the user would only see the Add Player section, and would be required to complete the required fields to click "Add Player"
AND Once a player has been successfully added to the form, the "Submit to BOC" button is enabled, and the "Add Player" button is greyed out.
AND The form should follow the provided data discovery and wireframe, including the disabling of fields once the player is added to the form.
BUT If the user subsequently removes the added player by clicking the trash can icon, then the Add Player button becomes available again, with the Submit to BOC being greyed out once again.

title: As a Club User I want to see a Drug Test Requests widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club
AND On the Club's International Dashboard there is a new "Drug Test Requests" tab.
AND On this tab there is the new Club Drug Test Requests widget.

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_club

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Club+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN accessing the the Club Drug Test Requests Widget
custom_expected:
THEN The widget should follow the provided data discovery and wireframe.
AND The widget should only show the viewing Org's drug test requests. 
AND If the player has an ebis profile, the name columns will be a hyperlink to the player's profile
AND The status column will be a hyperlink.  Clicking on a status will open the Request form in view mode

*Status mapping will be handled in a follow up story*

title: As a Club User I want to submit a Drug Test Request for a player to the BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club
AND Player has been added to the Drug Test Request form
AND the Submit to BOC button is enabled.


Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking the Submit to BOC button
custom_expected:
THEN a required field and format check will run per the provided data discovery
AND Once the required rules checks have passed, the form's status is updated to "Submitted" 
(for the Club) and "Pending Review" (for the BOC). 
AND The Submitted form should show on the Club's Drug Test Request widget as Submitted.
AND The Submitted form should show on the BOC's Drug Test Request widget as Pending Review.

title: As a Club User I want clicking Add Player on a new Drug Test Request to check if the player already exists in the system
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club


Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Business Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/International+Amateur+-+Profile+Visibility
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks "Add Player" on a Drug Test Request Form,
custom_expected:
THEN the system should check to see if there is already a player profile entered for the information entered that the user has permission to see.
AND This should re-use the existing logic that is checked on the Create New for an International Amateur profile for Club users
AND If a match is found, display the match(es) per the wireframe.
AND The user should have the ability to pick any of the existing profiles OR to add the newly entered information as a "new" player by selecting the appropriate entry via radio button and clicking "Add Player" 
AND The appropriate player's information will be added to the form, and the user will have the opportunity to complete the form as usual. 
BUT Clicking Cancel will close the matching message and return the user to the form with no player added.

title: As a Club User I want to create a new Drug Test Request for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club
AND The Create New Icon on International Amateur player profiles is updated to have the new option of "Drug Test Request".

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting "Drug Test Request" from the create new menu
custom_expected:
THEN  a new Drug Test Request form for the selected player with their information already prepopulated (including their ebisid) 
will be generated
AND The user should be able to submit the form to the BOC after completing the required information.
AND If the user chooses to 'trash' the added player, it would work just as though they had created this from scratch from the widget.

title: As a BOC User I want to review a Drug Test Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC


Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_boc
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to Requests on the Drug Test Request widget 
AND Clicks the hyperlink Request's status
custom_expected: THEN the hyperlink will open the request in view mode

title: As a BOC User I want to assign a Drug Test Request to a Registration Analyst
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_boc

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking the checkbox on a Drug Request's row will activate the "Assign To" button in the footer of the widget
custom_expected:
THEN  A new stand alone permission will be created that can be added to individual ebis account
AND Only users with this permission will appear as possible Registration Analysts
AND Clicking the apply button within the popover will assign the request to specified analyst
AND The assigned requests will now appear on the appropriate analysts request widgets

title: As a BOC Reg Analyst I want to see a Drug Test Requests widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
AND On the BOC's International Dashboard there is a new "Drug Test Requests" tab

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_analyst

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the "Drug Test Requests" tab
custom_expected:
THEN On this tab there is the new Reg Analyst Drug Test Requests widget.
AND The widget should follow the provided data discovery and wireframe. 

*Another story will cover the permissions to hide/show this widget and the other BOC widget, but they will share a tab*

title: As a BOC Reg Analyst I want my Drug Test Request widget to only contain Requests Assigned to me
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC Reg Analyst

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_analyst

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN a Registration Analyst is viewing the Reg Analyst's drug test request widget
custom_expected: THEN the only requests that they are able to see are those that have their username in the "Registration Analyst" field.

title: Drug Test Request PERMISSIONS
custom_steps:
**New LDAP Groups:**
ebis-widget-bocintldrugtesting
ebis-widget-reganalystintldrugtesting
ebis-widget-clubintldrugtesting

**Role Assignments:**

**BOC:**
ebis-widget-bocintldrugtesting
 -  ebis-intl-boc-drugtesting-admin-role
 - ebis-intl-boc-drugtesting-viewer-role

**Reg Analysts:**
ebis-widget-reganalystintldrugtesting
 - ebis-intl-boc-reganalysts-drugtesting-admin-role
 - ebis-intl-boc-reganalysts-drugtesting-viewer-role

**Clubs:**
ebis-widget-clubintldrugtesting
 - ebis-intl-club-drugtesting-admin-role
 - ebis-intl-club-drugtesting-viewer-role

title: As a User, I want the Drug Request Form Statuses Updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

State Flow and Mapping:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/State+Flow+and+Mapping

BOC Widget Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery

Reg Analyst Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+Discovery

Club Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Club+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Drug Test Requests form
custom_expected: THEN I want to see the statuses updated

title: As a User, I want the Drug Test Request Widgets Updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has the proper permissions

Wires:
BOC: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_boc
Reg Analyst: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_analyst
Club: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_club

Data Discoveries:
BOC: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery
Reg Analyst: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+Discovery
Club: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Club+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Drug Test Request Widget
custom_expected:
THEN There will be a Test Date column added to all three Drug Test Request widgets
AND There will be a BOC Comments bubble added to the BOC's Drug Test Request widget
AND This bubble will only be visible to BOC Users
AND This bubble will only be editable by BOC Users
AND There will be a Club Comments bubble added to all three Drug Test Request widgets
AND Only BOC and Reg Analyst Users will be able to edit

custom_steps: WHEN navigating to BOC's Drug Request Form
custom_expected: THEN the Drug Request Statuses were updated

custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a tester

State Flow and Mapping:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/State+Flow+and+Mapping

BOC Widget Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery

custom_expected: THEN the Reg Analyst's Drug Request Form Statuses Were Updated Properly

title: As a developer I want to move ebis link caching of player objects into the ebis link load services project
custom_steps: Caching of player objects in ebis link should be moved out of ebis and into the ebis link load services spring boot application.  Communication between ebis and the new application will take place using the SMS queue set up in #163265730Any places in ebis currently calling ebis link code to cache the object will now need to send a message (see the player api load batch for an example of how to send the message)The batch should also be updated to send emails using the email message when it starts, after processing 1000 records, and when it ends

title: As a developer I want to move ebis link caching of person objects into the ebis link load services project
custom_steps: Caching of person objects in ebis link should be moved out of ebis and into the ebis link load services spring boot application.  Communication between ebis and the new application will take place using the SMS queue set up in #163265730Any places in ebis currently calling ebis link code to cache the object will now need to send a message (see the player api load batch for an example of how to send the message)The batch should also be updated to send emails using the email message when it starts, after processing 1000 records, and when it ends

title: As a developer I want starting an API load batch to send a message to the ebis link SQS queue
custom_steps: Upon starting up each of the API Load batches a message should be added to the SQS queue that the batch is starting.

title: As a developer I want the ebis link load spring boot application to send an email when an API batch starts
custom_steps: Upon receiving a message on the SQS queue that a batch has started the ebis link load application should send an email to the batch notifications email list that the batch has started (including the batch name)

title: As a developer I want the ebis link load spring boot application to send an email when an API batch ends
custom_steps: Upon receiving a message on the SQS queue that a batch has ended the ebis link load application should send an email to the batch notifications email list that the batch has completed (including the batch name)
